feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] [UI] Edit fix (#9367) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9368
  • Bug fix for activating plugins via UI (#9338) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9370
  • [0.17.x] use dayjs in datefield (#9380) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9381
  • [0.17.x] [UI] Improve order parts wizard (#9389) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9421
  • [0.17.x] Serialize stock fix (#9441) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9443
  • [0.17.x] Report cache fix (#9447) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9448
  • [0.17.x] Wrap values() call in list to fix type error (#9460) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9461
  • [0.17.x] Handle potential null header (#9462) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9463
  • Notification permissions (#9449) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9464

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9325
  • Improve custom maintenance mode backend (#9396) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9397
  • [0.17.x] Update overdue order notification (#9444) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9445
  • [UI] Row hover (#9465) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9466

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.9...0.17.10

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Fix for URL validation (#9539) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9540
  • [Backport] URL fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9550
  • [0.17.x] Remove trailing slash from SITE_URL (#9559) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9560

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9468

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.10...0.17.11

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] fix(backend): Make task registering more robust (#9586) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9605
  • Backport reqres token fix to 0.17.x by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9685

Other Changes

  • [0.17.x] feat(docs): include docs in release (#9524) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9578
  • [0.17.x] bump docs deps (#9581) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9590
  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9658
  • [0.17.x] Update 0111_auto_20230521_1350.py (#9659) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9660

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.11...0.17.12

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

Security Patches

  • Security fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9727

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] fix(backend): record export is empty when include permissions flag is used (#9704) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9719

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9725

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.12...0.17.13

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Handle failed partial_rebuild (#9723) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9724
  • [0.17.x] Handle case where owner is null (#9732) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9733
  • fix: package - various changes by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9802

Devops / Setup Changes

  • [0.17.x] feat: add cluster monitor task (#9812) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9815

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.13...0.17.14
